metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2795 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
By flooding the target resolver with queries exploiting this flaw anattacker can significantly impair the resolver's performance, effectivelydenying legitimate clients access to the DNS resolution service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2795` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
bind9-host - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
bind9utils - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
dnsutils - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
host - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libbind9-140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libdns-export162 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libdns162 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libirs-export141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libirs141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libisc-export160 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libisc160 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libisccc-export140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libisccc140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libisccfg-export140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
libisccfg140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
liblwres141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
lwresd - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: bind9 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm3').
